Class GroupList

  • java.lang.Object
    • GroupList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GroupList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A list of all the groups in a particular GroupServer.
    See Also:
    GroupThread, Serialized Form
